item.title: YouTube Screencast Video Presenter for SaaS Tutorials - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone who would record videos in-line with the videos we have on our YouTube Channel.

We are a US-based company. We build tools for Airtable. You can find our website here: miniextensions.com

Requirements:
- Fluent in English
- be able to commit 40hrs/wk immediately.
- Upwork tracker, we don't allow manual time.
- No video editing required (focus solely on recording high-quality, clear, and concise content)

We want videos similar to the following:

item.title: Video editor for Faceless Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced video editor to join our team and help create engaging content for our YouTube channel in the Celebrity Niche. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of video editing software, such as Adobe Premiere and After Effects, and a creative eye for storytelling.

Responsibilities:

- Edit video footage and audio to create engaging content for our YouTube channel
- Work closely with our creative team to develop and implement video concepts
- Ensure all videos meet our brand guidelines and are of the highest quality
- Ensure all videos meet YouTube’s policies
- Collaborate with other members of the team to ensure timely delivery of videos
- Stay up to date with the latest trends and techniques in video editing

Requirements:
- 2+ years of experience in video editing
- Strong skills in Adobe Premiere and After Effects
- Experience working with a variety of video formats and codecs
- Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills

This is a full-time position, with the possibility of remote work. If you are passionate about video editing and want to be a part of a dynamic team, please apply with your resume, samples and a portfolio of your work.



Budget: $300
Posted On: June 21, 2024 22:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: 3 Secs Video Editing Needed: Remove Reflections and Window Images for Advertisement - Upwork
item.description:
We have a video that we want to use for our advertisements. We want to remove the reflection on the left side of the vehicle and the image on the right inner windows. The goal is to eliminate the reflections. Thats all for now.

If you could provide an example of the video with two frames from the 1st and 3rd seconds, it would be a great help for us to choose right colleague friend.

Note ; The video appears with a background in the link. When downloaded, you can see it without the background (black)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1c3JNfm-tuspSr2M65P2KXPFJ8X3rNyVk/view?usp=sharing

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 21, 2024 22:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Audition, Adobe Photoshop, Maxon Cinema 4D, Avid Media Composer, Prezi, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Illustrator

item.title: Video Editor for Faceless Youtube Gaming Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative video editor to join our team and produce engaging YouTube faceless gaming channel.
The ideal candidate will have experience in editing kids gaming content and a strong understanding of YouTube video trends. This is a great opportunity for someone who is passionate about gaming and wants to contribute to a growing channel.

Responsibilities:
- Edit and enhance gaming footage to create engaging videos
- Add visual effects, transitions, and sound effects
- Ensure videos are optimized for YouTube platform
- Collaborate with the content creator to achieve the desired video style
-Genrate Voiceover With AI Tolls

Requirements:
- Proficient in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
- Proven experience in video editing and production.
- Creative mindset with an eye for detail and quality.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
-Proficient in English
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.


Size: Small
Duration: 8-10 Minute video
Expertise: Intermediate
Willing to hire for full time.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 21, 2024 22:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, YouTube Development, Video Editing & Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, YouTube Development, Video Editing & Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Cutting videos into shorts - Upwork
item.description:
I have videos of conferences which I need to cut. Some are keynotes, some are Questions and Answers. Some are group brainstorming. I need them to be cut without giving indications on which part to cut. The goal is to turn all videos into interesting reels / shorts. I will provide the music, the intro, the outro and the theme if needed including the guidelines (font, colors, branding to use). But I need someone to select key parts and extract them.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 22:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Story, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Videography, Video Production
Skills: Instagram Story, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Videography, Video Production
Country: Serbia
click to apply
